name: 4chan - Midnight Caek
description: This is the Midnight Caek color scheme from the OneeChan 4chan style. Don't install this style. This style is for me only and this is just where I post it. You can install it if you want, but I'm not gonna change anything for anyone but myself. Sorry.
additional_info: Update: Removed arrows on the sides of posts, and made all replies equal width. Update: Okay, I fixed the postform width for real this time. Update: Fixed the delete form. Update: Made Quick Reply form wider. Update: 4chan updated its FAQ page, so I updated the CSS. Update: 4chan updated with more features and a different quick reply, styled accordingly. Update: Fixed styling on /rs/ and /f/, they were oddly coded Update: Fixed input fields for the "4chan Pass" form Update: Since I use a 4chan Pass, this style blocks out the Captcha part of the posting page. Just remove the commented line to re-enable the Captcha. Update: Added the option to disable Captcha or not. Update: Changed various red text to white text, fixed an irritating quirk in the footer. Update: Changed border color around logo to white. Update: AdBlock Plus wasn't hiding the ads for some reason, so I just display:none'd them. Update: Opacity:0'd hr tags. Should look much cleaner now. Update: Display:none'd the reply stubs of hidden threads, made the board links bigger Update: Made the text boards look nicer, and made .boxcontent text bigger. Update: Now colors change when a post is highlighted. Update: Fixed an obnoxious bug. Boards should feel more natural now. Update: did a thing 4/9/14: Hid the Blotter table, fixed link and quote colors 5/9/14: Made the post form completely visible, hid the "New Thread" and "Post Reply" links 8/20/14: Fixed the postform width for the new "Options" field

discussions.name: Great once I fixed Captcha (see post)
Style is active on every website
